Key Match Events: Orioles committed three errors for the third time this season.
Shohei Ohtani hit his 41st home run of the season.
Teoscar Hernández hit his 28th home run of the season.
Shohei Ohtani stole his 42nd base of the season.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Brandon Hyde commented on the errors and the team's offensive performance.
Corbin Burnes reflected on his pitching performance and the need to avoid big innings.
Hyde discussed Gunnar Henderson's defensive errors as growing pains.
Hyde expressed hope for Dillon Tate's future after being designated for assignment.
Hyde provided an update on Heston Kjerstad's recovery from a concussion.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers gave away Shohei Ohtani bobbleheads.
Shohei Ohtani's dog delivered the first pitch to Ohtani.
Others: The Orioles remain a game behind the Yankees in the American League East.
The Orioles have made 68 errors this season, with Henderson, McCann, and Urías responsible for 33 of them.
Coby Mayo hit his 22nd home run in Triple-A Norfolk's game.
Cade Povich will face Bobby Miller in the next game of the series.
